text: Requiebro is a 1955 Argentine musical comedy movie directed by Carlos Schlieper and starring Carmen Sevilla, Ángel Magaña, Ricardo Castro Ríos, Manuel Perales, Irma Roy. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:1955 musical movies Category:Argentine comedy movies Category:Argentine musical movies Category:Movies directed by Carlos Schlieper
title: Requiebro
